Description: For your consideration; a very special 2014 USA factory built PRS S2 Mira in desirable McCarty Tobacco Upgraded $300.00 Kiesel Lithium Pickups included w/ the originals! I’m Including the original G&B factory installed pickups and original push/pull pot in the sale. Flawless playing guitar what you’ve come to expect from PRS. Excellent playing condition with a few small scratches on body and pick guard as included in pictures. (Note 3 scratches/nicks on body) Overall playing condition is excellent Overall Condition of Guitar is a solid 8 out of ten; would be a 9.5 if not for a few scratches/marks. Straight Neck Great Action 22 Frets 3 Way Toggle USA build I had the pickups changed to Kiesel Lithium’s. These are a more high gain output than the originals and came out of a $3,800 Custom Kiesel) Amazing Pickups. NOTE: I also had the push/pull pot changed to a straight 3-way, bridge, middle, neck. These are Bright Sounding pickups but if you back off the tone to 5 or under it gives them a filthy, dark tone which sounds awesome in front of a distorted amp. (I am including the original pickups and original Pot as well) Continental USA shipping only with tracking and insurance Will be neatly packed and double boxed. Message me if you have any questions before buying Buy with confidence and see my reviews Cheers Below are the specs: - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - PRS S2 Mira Sunburst With an understated, refined appearance, instant comfort and playability, and a voice that is familiar and captivating, the vintage-inspired S2 Mira is a guitar you won’t want to put down. Its all-mahogany body and asymmetrical, beveled top give the S2 Mira much of its explosive tone.
